member.name: T:Falsus.Providers.Internet.AvatarSvgProvider
member.summary: Represents a provider of values containing and SVG representation of an instance.
member.remarks: This provider works as a proxy for the converting the instance to an SVG string.

member.name: F:Falsus.Providers.Internet.AvatarSvgProvider.AvatarCirclePlaceholder
member.summary: A string containing the placeholder for the avatar circle when the value is specified. When the value is specified then the placeholder will be replaced by an empty string.

member.name: F:Falsus.Providers.Internet.AvatarSvgProvider.AvatarMouthPlaceholder
member.summary: A string containing the placeholder for the avatar mouth.
member.remarks: The placeholder will be replaced by the SVG representation of the selected value.

member.name: F:Falsus.Providers.Internet.AvatarSvgProvider.AvatarNosePlaceholder
member.summary: A string containing the placeholder for the avatar nose.
member.remarks: The placeholder will be replaced by the SVG representation of default avatar nose.

member.name: M:Falsus.Providers.Internet.EmailProvider.GetRowValue(Falsus.DataGeneratorContext,System.String[])
member.summary: Generates a random street name based on the context and excluded objects.
member.param: An instance of defining the current generation context.
An array of values that cannot be returned by the provider.
member.returns: A random email.
member.remarks: The generated email address will result from the concatenation of the argument values (seperated by a dot) along with a randomly chosen domain from the list. If nothing is provided as the value, a random string will be generated. If the contains the value that was generated then a number will be appended at end (eg. if john.doe@domain.com is present then it will become john.doe2@domain.com).

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Internet.MimeTypeProviderConfiguration.IncludeDeprecated
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not deprecated MIME types should be considered for random value generation.
member.value: True if deprecated MIME types should be included, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Internet.MimeTypeProviderConfiguration.ExcludeUncommon
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not uncommon MIME types should be excluded from the random value generation.
member.value: True if uncommon MIME types should be excluded, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Internet.MimeTypeProviderConfiguration.TreatAliasesAsUnique
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not MIME type aliases should be considered as unique.
member.value: True if aliases should be considered unique, otherwise false.
member.remarks: Settings this value to true will cause, for example, application/javascript and text/javascript to be treated as two different MIME types.
